Forgot your password ? Please enter your email to continue An email will be sent with a confirmation link, open it to change your password Email not found ! Send Back
Enter a new password It should be more than 6 characters and have at least one upper case Password again Password do not match ! Change Profile My Requests Submit a new Request Contact Disconnect WELCOME BACK, HOW CAN WE HELP YOU TODAY ? My Profile Edit Profile Contact uspri Privacy Information Share App Logout Ivan CEAICOVSCHI ceaika007@yahoo.com 0616563508 116 Avenue de la Republique COURBEVOIE Edit Profile Save Nothing found Phone Address Link for the picture City Speak with out brilliant and knowledgeable support team Support is available Mon-Fri 8AM-7PM ET / 10AM-Midnight GMT Ivan CEAICOVSCHI Raphael ISRAEL Eduard SERBAN Send us an email team.support@benevold.com Give us a call (+33) 6 16 56 35 08 Come to see us 242 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Antoine, 75012 Paris Review BenevOld Privacy Policy It\'s important that you understand what information BenevOld collects, uses and how you can control it. We explain it in detail in our updated BenevOld Privacy Policy and you can review the key points below. Why does BenevOld use your data ? Mainly to keep you safe, all the data we collect are only used to make you feel as protected as we can. Some Examples of data BenevOld collects and uses are : Some Information about BenevOld BenevOld is an app designed to help old people. We want to make this planet a better place to those in need. Founded by three people from France. We are a non profit organisation, and our interests are purely academical.
Tell us more about your needs ? What category does it aplies to ? How can we contact you ? Can you provide any more details ? Show my address When do you need us to help you ? At what time do you need help ? Other (precise) Enter at least a title
